title: 67: Bachelor in Paradise: Week 1 (Part 2)
itunes:title: 67: Bachelor in Paradise: Week 1 (Part 2)
description:
The Broads chat part two of the first week of Paradise and it is drama filled, indeed! Blake has now gone to social media to plead his case of which we did not see until after recording this episode. That and more will be discussed next week!
*** DAILY HARVEST: Go to DAILY HARVEST dot com and enter promo code CHATTY to get $25 off your first box!
